entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
